scripts.vercel-build: for SYMLINK_DIR in docs/snippets/examples docs/snippets/examples_cli docs/snippets/examples_sdk docs/snippets/examples_sdk_guest docs/snippets/examples_sdk_toml; do cp -rL $SYMLINK_DIR $SYMLINK_DIR-tmp && rm -rf $SYMLINK_DIR && mv $SYMLINK_DIR-tmp $SYMLINK_DIR; done && pnpm build
